name: Chimera (itch) (shiftBacktick)
description:
Explore a faithful recreation of Chimera Steppes, Nebraska, a fictional art installation filled with millions of expertly tuned chimes. It's been said that every walk takes visitors on unexpected journeys. Enjoy!

Chimera is best experienced with a gamepad and headphones. 

How to play

Walk with WASD, turn with QE or the mouse, toggle auto move with F, and hear something new with R. Please view the manual for alternative controls, system requirements, and more.
